publicwhip.spmotion: *S1M-2608 Mr Jim Wallace: The Draft Advice and Assistance (Assistance by Way of Representation) (Scotland) Amendment Regulations 2002-That the Justice 1 Committee, in consideration of the draft Advice and Assistance (Assistance by Way of Representation) (Scotland) Amendment Regulations 2002, recommends that the Regulations be approved. Supported by: Dr Richard Simpson*

S1M-2608 Mr Jim Wallace: The Draft Advice and Assistance (Assistance by Way of Representation) (Scotland) Amendment Regulations 2002-That the Justice 1 Committee, in consideration of the draft Advice and Assistance (Assistance by Way of Representation) (Scotland) Amendment Regulations 2002, recommends that the Regulations be approved. Supported by: Dr Richard Simpson
